{"id":1462892599,"question_id":3535,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1732582734,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1321 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1462892599/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Count of Monotonic Pairs I","memory":"54.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> arr;\n    int N;\n\n    int memo[2001][51][51];\n    const int MOD = 1e9+7;\n    int dp(int i, int mx, int mn) {\n        if (i < 0) return 1;\n        if (memo[i][mx][mn] != -1)\n            return memo[i][mx][mn];\n\n        long long sum = 0;\n        for (int j=0; j<=mx; j++) {\n            if (arr[i] - j >= mn) {\n                sum += dp(i-1, j, arr[i] - j) % MOD;\n            }\n        }\n        memo[i][mx][mn] = sum % MOD;\n        return memo[i][mx][mn];\n    }\n\n    int countOfPairs(vector<int>& nums) {\n        fill(&memo[0][0][0], &memo[0][0][0] + sizeof(memo)/sizeof(memo[0][0][0]), -1);\n        arr = nums;\n        N = (int)arr.size();\n\n        return dp(N-1, 50, 0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-count-of-monotonic-pairs-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
